avatar.description: Data URI of the user's avatar.

completedGames.description: An array of completed game IDs.

completedQuizzes.description: An array of completed quiz IDs.

completedLessons.description: An array of completed lesson IDs.

ForumPost.title: Forum Post
ForumPost.description: Represents a single post in the community forum.

authorId.description: The UID of the post author.

authorName.description: The name of the post author.

authorAvatar.description: The avatar of the post author.

title.description: The title of the forum post.

content.description: The main content of the post.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

ForumComment.title: Forum Comment
ForumComment.description: Represents a single comment on a forum post.

authorId.description: The UID of the comment author.

authorName.description: The name of the comment author.

authorAvatar.description: The avatar of the comment author.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the comment was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile data, keyed by their authentication UID.

/forumPosts/{postId}.description: Collection of all posts in the community forum.

/forumPosts/{postId}/comments/{commentId.description: Sub-collection of comments for a specific forum post.
